description:
Jonouchi frantically searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it from him. As he struggles to accept the fact that Shizuka will be blind forever, he receives help from a new, and unexpected, friend!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 凶悪・重機械[ヘビィ・メタル]デッキ
